name: io.github.SimplyMinimal/fleet-mcp
description: An MCP server that provides tools for managing and monitoring your Fleet Device Management instance.

environmentVariables.description: Your Fleet API token. Get this from Fleet UI: My account > Get API token
environmentVariables.name: FLEET_API_TOKEN

environmentVariables.description: Allow SELECT queries in read-only mode. This allows you to run live queries.
environmentVariables.name: FLEET_ALLOW_SELECT_QUERIES

environmentVariables.description: Verify SSL certificates when connecting to your Fleet instance.
environmentVariables.name: FLEET_VERIFY_SSL
